<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_off"
             source.down="button_on" scale9Grid="14,14,4,4"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="32" fontFamily="黑体"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" textColor.down="0x000000"  verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="button_off" scale9Grid="14,14,4,4"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source.down="button_on" source="button_off" scale9Grid="14,14,4,4"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="黑体"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data.label}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="progressBg" source="bg_LVtiao" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" scale9Grid="1,1,6,6" left="2" right="2" top="2" bottom="2" source="jindutiao"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="黑体" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" height="58" width="161">
    <e:Image source="bg_yinxiaokai"
             source.up="bg_yinxiaoguan"
             source.down="bg_yinxiaoguan"
             source.disabled="bg_yinxiaoguan" scale9Grid="14,14,3,2" left="0" top="0" right="0" bottom="0"/>
    <e:Image source="button_yinxiao"
            
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="48"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="48"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="48"
             left="4" right="105" top="4" bottom="4" scale9Grid="14,14,3,3"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="View.BankMsgItem" width="200" height="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="bankMsgGroup" alpha="0.5" width="200" height="100" y="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Image id="backMsgImage" source="mainGame_json.button_hong" scale9Grid="14,14,5,5" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Label id="backMsgLabel" text="余额不足稍后再领" fontFamily="黑体" left="28" right="28" top="10" bottom="10" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" size="30"/>
		<e:Label id="backEarnLabel" fontFamily="黑体" textAlign="center" size="70" text="+50" verticalAlign="middle" y="10" width="144" height="80" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="View.BankMsgItemView" width="200" height="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="bankMsgGroup" alpha="0.5" width="200" height="100" y="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Image id="backMsgImage" source="mainGame_json.button_hong" scale9Grid="14,14,5,5" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Label id="backMsgLabel" text="余额不足稍后再领" fontFamily="黑体" left="28" right="28" top="10" bottom="10" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" size="30"/>
		<e:Label id="backEarnLabel" fontFamily="黑体" textAlign="center" size="70" text="+50" verticalAlign="middle" y="10" width="144" height="80" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="View.ErrorMsgView" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group height="720" left="0" right="0" y="0">
		<e:Group height="400" verticalCenter="-32" horizontalCenter="0" minWidth="600">
			<e:Image source="mainGame_json.bg_tiankuang04" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" scale9Grid="1,1,1,1" smoothing="true"/>
			<e:Rect height="60" y="186" fillColor="0x93BCD3" left="0" right="0"/>
			<e:Image source="mainGame_json.icon_zhuyi" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-113.5"/>
			<e:Label id="errorMsg" bold="true" y="200" left="0" right="0" textAlign="center"/>
			<e:Button id="Yes" label="确定" horizontalCenter="-1" verticalCenter="134" width="200"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="View.HeadItemView" states="up,down" width="166" height="166" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="headGroup" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Image id="headBg" source="hong" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" scale9Grid="1,1,1,1"/>
		<e:Image id="headBtn" source="01" fillMode="scale" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image id="headMask" source="bg_02" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" scale9Grid="1,1,1,1" alpha="0.5" visible="false"/>												
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="View.HeadMsgView" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ViewModel="ViewModel.*">
	<e:Group id="headMsgGroup" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Group id="headListGroup" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="810" height="630" verticalCenter="25" horizontalCenter="-215">
			<e:Image id="headBg" scale9Grid="1,1,1,628" width="810" height="630" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="mainGame_json.bg_tiankuang03"/>
			<e:Image id="listBg" scale9Grid="1,1,1,1" horizontalCenter="0" width="810" height="456" verticalCenter="-17" source="mainGame_json.bg_tiankuang04"/>
			<e:Label id="headTitle" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="黑体" size="44" verticalCenter="-280" text="設定頭像"/>
			<e:Button id="cancelBtn" label="取消" width="233" verticalCenter="264.5" height="71" horizontalCenter="0" skinName="skins.ButtonSkin"/>
			<e:Scroller width="810" height="456" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-17">
				<e:Group height="692">
					<ViewModel:HeadItemVM id="sagittariusBtn" skinName="View.HeadItemView" verticalCenter="-116" horizontalCenter="-287"/>
					<ViewModel:HeadItemVM id="leoBtn" horizontalCenter="-287" verticalCenter="72" skinName="View.HeadItemView" x="10" y="10"/>
					<ViewModel:HeadItemVM id="ariesBtn" x="20" y="20" skinName="View.HeadItemView" horizontalCenter="-287" verticalCenter="261"/>
					<ViewModel:HeadItemVM id="scorpioBtn" skinName="View.HeadItemView" horizontalCenter="-98" verticalCenter="-116"/>
					<ViewModel:HeadItemVM id="libraBtn" horizontalCenter="-98" verticalCenter="72" skinName="View.HeadItemView" x="10" y="10"/>
					<ViewModel:HeadItemVM id="cancerBtn" x="20" y="20" skinName="View.HeadItemView" horizontalCenter="-98" verticalCenter="261"/>
					<ViewModel:HeadItemVM id="taurusBtn" skinName="View.HeadItemView" horizontalCenter="88" verticalCenter="-116"/>
					<ViewModel:HeadItemVM id="geminiBtn" horizontalCenter="88" skinName="View.HeadItemView" verticalCenter="72" x="10" y="10"/>
					<ViewModel:HeadItemVM id="capricornBtn" y="20" x="20" horizontalCenter="88" verticalCenter="261" skinName="View.HeadItemView"/>
					<ViewModel:HeadItemVM id="virgoBtn" skinName="View.HeadItemView" horizontalCenter="275" verticalCenter="-116"/>
					<ViewModel:HeadItemVM id="piscesBtn" horizontalCenter="275" verticalCenter="72" skinName="View.HeadItemView" x="10" y="10"/>
					<ViewModel:HeadItemVM id="aquariusBtn" x="20" y="20" skinName="View.HeadItemView" horizontalCenter="275" verticalCenter="261"/>
					<e:layout>
						<e:BasicLayout/>
					</e:layout>
				</e:Group>
			</e:Scroller>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="View.IntroductionView" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0.6" strokeAlpha="1"/>
		<e:Image id="background" source="introduction1" verticalCenter="0" width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" alpha="1"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="View.LevelItemView" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="levelItemGroup" left="0" top="0" width="212" height="550">
		<e:Image id="levelImage" alpha.disabled="0.5" source="level_01_png" scale9Grid="14,14,4,4" width="610" height="630" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image id="levelMask" width="100%" height="100%" alpha="0.01" source.down="bg_02" alpha.down="0.5" source="mainGame_json.bg_02" scale9Grid="1,1,1,1"/>
		<e:Label id="levelName" textColor="0xFFFFFF" fontFamily="黑体" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" size="40" height="90" verticalCenter="147" text="埃菲爾鐵塔" left="8" right="72"/>
		<e:Label id="costLabel" textColor="0xFFFFFF" size="25" text="入場費：" fontFamily="黑体" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" height="24" left="6" verticalCenter="214"/>
		<e:Image id="costImage" source="icon_jinbi" scaleX="0.65" scaleY="0.65" horizontalCenter="8" verticalCenter="215"/>
		<e:Label id="costValue" left="138" textColor="0xFFFFFF" size="26" text="125" fontFamily="黑体" textAlign="left" verticalCenter="214" verticalAlign="middle" height="24" x="10" y="10"/>
		<e:Label id="duringValue" left="7" textColor="0xFFFFFF" size="25" text="10秒" fontFamily="黑体" textAlign="left" verticalCenter="248" verticalAlign="middle" height="24" x="10" y="10"/>
		<e:Label id="turnValue" verticalCenter="248" textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="4回合" fontFamily="黑体" left="86" size="25" x="20" y="20" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" height="24"/>
		<e:Image id="sceneOwnImage" source="01" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
		<e:Group id="lockGroup" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
			<e:Image id="lockBg" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" alpha="0.5" scale9Grid="1,1,1,1" source="mainGame_json.bg_01"/>
			<e:Image id="lockImage" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="mainGame_json.icon_suo"/>
			<e:Label id="lockLabel" text="尚未解鎖" fontFamily="黑体" horizontalCenter="2" verticalCenter="74" size="24"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="View.LevelUpView" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0.6" strokeAlpha="0.6"/>
		<e:Image id="light" source="guang" verticalCenter="-140" width="478" height="466" horizontalCenter="0" alpha="0.3"/>
		<e:Image id="levelupImg" source="levelup" height="144" width="150" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-143"/>
		<e:Label text="等级提升" y="365" size="80" fontFamily="Adobe 黑体 Std R" textColor="0xFFFFFF" horizontalCenter="0" bold="true"/>
		<e:Label id="levelupName" text=" 第 2 级" y="513" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="Adobe 黑体 Std R" size="40" bold="true"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="View.LoadingBarItem" width="380" height="34" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="loadingBg" scale9Grid="4,4,8,8" source="loading01" width="380" height="34" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="loadingBar" top="4" bottom="4" left="4" source="loading02" scale9Grid="1,1,1,1" width="380"/>
	<e:Image id="handleIcon" source="mainGame_json.loading03" verticalCenter="1" x="0"/>
	<e:Label id="loadingLabel" text="标签" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="1" fontFamily="黑体" size="24"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="View.LogoView" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ViewModel="ViewModel.*">
	<e:Group id="logoGroup" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" alpha="0">
		<e:Image id="logoImage" width="460" height="137" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0" alpha="1" source="logo_png"/>
		<ViewModel:LoadingBarItemVM id="loadingBarItem" width="378" height="32" alpha="1" horizontalCenter="-1" verticalCenter="171" skinName="View.LoadingBarItem" visible="false"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="View.MainGameView" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ViewModel="ViewModel.*">
	<e:Group id="searchGroup" width="1280" height="720" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Image id="searchBg" fillMode="scale" left="2" right="-2" top="-1" bottom="1" source="hui"/>
		<e:Group id="opponentGroup" width="640" x="640" height="720" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:Button id="cancelBtn" label="取消" width="235" height="72" skinName="skins.ButtonSkin" verticalCenter="290" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
			<e:Group id="boboGroup" width="610" height="636" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0">
				<e:Image id="bobo_01" source="bobo" width="610" height="636" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" scaleX="0" scaleY="0"/>
				<e:Image id="bobo_02" source="bobo" width="610" height="636" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
				<e:Image id="bobo_03" source="bobo" width="610" height="636" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group id="dotGroup" width="610" height="636" verticalCenter="0" x="15">
				<e:Image id="dot_01" source="shengnuehao_da" verticalCenter="3" horizontalCenter="0" width="96" height="96"/>
				<e:Image id="dot_02" source="shengnuehao_da" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="2" width="96" height="96"/>
				<e:Image id="dot_03" width="96" height="96" source="shengnuehao_da" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				<e:Image id="dot_04" source="shengnuehao_da" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0" width="96" height="96"/>
				<e:Image id="dot_05" source="shengnuehao_da" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="10" y="10" width="96" height="96"/>
				<e:Image id="dot_06" source="shengnuehao_da" horizontalCenter="0" width="96" verticalCenter="0" height="96" x="10" y="10"/>
				<e:Image id="dot_07" source="shengnuehao_da" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="10" y="10" width="96" height="96"/>
				<e:layout>
					<e:HorizontalLayout gap="4" horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Label id="searchLabel" text="正在搜寻对手" y="114" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="黑体" stroke="1" strokeColor="0x000000"/>
			<e:Label id="timeLabel" horizontalCenter="0" y="212" text="1" fontFamily="黑体" x="10" size="108"/>
			<e:Group id="matchGroup" width="640" x="640" height="720" verticalCenter="0">
				<e:Image id="opponentBg" source="level_04_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
				<e:Group id="opponentHeadGroup" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="250" height="300" x="10" y="10">
					<e:Image id="opponentHeadBorder" left="0" top="0" bottom="0" right="0" source="mainGame_json.bg_02" scale9Grid="1,1,1,1"/>
					<e:Image id="opponentHeadBg" left="15" right="15" top="15" bottom="65" source="mainGame_json.hong" scale9Grid="1,1,1,1"/>
					<e:Group id="opponentHeadIconGroup" right="15" left="15" top="15" bottom="65">
						<e:Image id="opponentHeadIcon" scale9Grid="1,1,1,1" source="01" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
					</e:Group>
					<e:Label id="opponentName" textColor="0x403F3F" horizontalCenter="1" text="参赛者" fontFamily="黑体" bottom="15" size="35" top="250"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:layout>
					<e:BasicLayout/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="myGroup" width="640" x="-640" height="720" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:Image id="myBg" source="level_01_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
			<e:Group id="headGroup" height="300" width="250" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0">
				<e:Image id="headBorder" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="bg_02" scale9Grid="1,1,1,1"/>
				<e:Image id="headBg" source="hong" scale9Grid="1,1,1,1" left="15" right="15" top="15" bottom="65"/>
				<e:Group id="headIconGroup" left="15" right="15" top="15" bottom="65">
					<e:Image id="headIcon" scale9Grid="1,1,1,1" source="01" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Label id="nameLabel" text="参赛者" fontFamily="黑体" size="35" horizontalCenter="1" bottom="15" textColor="0x403F3F" top="250"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Image id="shuziBg" source="bg_shuzi" width="720" height="720" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" alpha="0.1" visible="false"/>
		<e:Label id="shuziLabel" width="79" height="70" size="72" textColor="0xFF9D00" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" fontFamily="黑体" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
	</e:Group>
